data.description:
Become a virtual florist, fully immersed in the world of floral beauty. Escape into a realm of relaxation and decorate your entire space with flowers.

Use hand tracking or controllers to create amazing arrangements with a variety of items.

COMING SOON: 
- "Play" Mode: Time challenges to create specific flower arrangements under a time limit or take flower quizes to become the best virtual florist.
- New fresh flower and decorations into the Florist Book.

changelog.change_log:
Build v1.2.2
Updates & UI Improvements:

1. Added support for controllers, allowing users to switch between hand tracking or controller input at any time during gameplay.
2. Added a toggle passthrough feature accessible by pressing the menu button, enabling users to seamlessly switch between being fully immersed in the virtual environment and gaining awareness of their real-world surroundings, enhancing convenience and comfort during gameplay.
3. Expanded creative tools with the ability to change pedestal color and toggle the arch and pedestal on/off, providing users with more customization options for their virtual garden.
4. Redesigned Flower Book interface with individual labels for each flower or ornament, enhancing organization and accessibility.
5. Implemented the ability to grab the Flower Book and move it around for easier reference.
6. Added the ability to grab and place the flower pot everywhere, enabling users to freely arrange their garden layout and be more creative.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback. We are committed to providing the best possible experience in My Flower Reality. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for future updates, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Enjoy and relax in your virtual garden!
